::Greven/Scyther::

Greven was ready this time, and successfully dodged both shots. 
Scyther's shuttle passes him, continuing to fire at the Energonian 
shuttle.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>        The Energonian shuttles quickly picked up Scayther, Aleo, 
Celeno, 
> Octipite, Alecto, Kali, and Darkfate. They would stand little 
chance of a 
> hard battle arising in this situation. Ominous commanded they stay 
and fight.
>        "Blast them agian, and Quasar, repair the left Naucel. Its 
leaking 
> energon from Aleo's blast." Ominous said. To the left of the main 
shuttle, 
> Akrons shuttle made a sharp about face and sent three energon 
missles raining 
> down on Aleo's vessle.
>        As for Greven, Ominous targeted him agian and fired. This 
time only 
> two blasts from the Tripulse canon. He needed to save as much 
energy as 
> possible.
>        Venus, in the smaller shuttle to the right, begins to ready 
weapons 
> for the upcoming vessles.
> 
> 
>        Hell Beast looked to Shockwave. "Were packed and ready. 
Detenators are 
> placed throughout the cave. We can leave now. Take us to the new 
base." He 
> glanced at the transport shuttles and the team of Predacons 
piloting them. 
> The Neo Deception Empire was just beginning.
